Package tage.networking

Class Message

java.lang.Object
tage.networking.Message
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Message extends Object implements Serializable
Class for normalizing client/server communication Built to be used primarily by ProtocolClient and GameServerUDP/TCP
See Also:
